concept.definition: XML content-type corresponding to the application/xml+fhir mime-type.
JSON content-type corresponding to the application/json+fhir mime-type.

text.div:
ContentType

The content or mime type.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/content-type defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
xml xmlXML content-type corresponding to the application/xml+fhir mime-type.
json jsonJSON content-type corresponding to the application/json+fhir mime-type.
